title: Musical Instrument Proficiency
content:
Musical Instrument Proficiency Effect You know how to play a variety of musical instruments and are able to entertain a crowd with them Requirements Bard Lvl 1

Musical Instrument Proficiency

You know how to play a variety of musical instruments and are able to entertain a crowd with them

Musical Instrument Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
